name: Star Jump (hpx7)
description:
Star jump is a multiplayer 2D platformer. You and your friends must rush to find the star at the top of the map. However, there are not enough platforms to make it all the way to the top. To help out your friends, you can sacrifice yourself by turning into a platform.

Use arrow keys to move and spacebar to die and turn into a platform. The platforms are randomly generated for each level.

Built using Hathora multiplayer framework

Source code: https://github.com/hathora/star-jump
